item.title: 全球成人肥胖率在过去 30 年中增加了一倍多，儿童和青少年肥胖率的增长速度几乎是成人的两倍。
item.description:
1bn people are now defined as obese.

Global obesity rates in adults have more than doubled in the past three decades and increased at almost twice that pace for children and adolescentshttps://t.co/zNGR5k0RcL pic.twitter.com/sxBq3LCGIC

— Financial Times (@FT) March 1, 2024

item.title: 本周我为《金融时报》（@FinancialTimes）撰写了一篇关于 "明智 "减税的文章。在写作过程中，我列出了我最关心的三个税种，（大部分）都已经削减了...... 🧵

item.title: 钴市场出现了创纪录的过剩。产量的激增预计将加强中国在电子产品、电动汽车和航空领域所用金属的生产和价格方面的主导地位。
item.description:
The cobalt market has been overwhelmed by a record glut.

The surge in output is expected to strengthen China’s dominance over the production and price of a metal used in electronics, electric cars and aviationhttps://t.co/4brn1xx56H pic.twitter.com/rnzupP0oPj

— Financial Times (@FT) March 1, 2024
